data:item.name: mcxn947-keyscan-interface-by-smartdma
data:item.display_title: AN14184 Using SmartDMA for Keyscan on MCX N Series MCU
data:item.overview: This software accompanies application note [AN14184](nxp.com.cn/docs/en/application-note/AN14184.pdf).This application note mainly introduces the Keyscan solution for MCX N series MCU. It includes the introduction of the Keyscan solution, its features and API routines, and a demo.
